page.title: 10Wheal Jane.
page.content: {Wheal Jane tin mine}is situated outside Threemilestone in Baldhu Grid Ref.772,426.{Wheal Jane}is one of {Cornwall's}largest Tin Mines, now operated by{CARNON R.T.Z METALS. Wheal {Jane}has 26 shafts and 15 levels, one of which is used as an{ADIT.}Adit means a level that is used for draining the mine. The{Wheal Jane Mine {stretches for 13 miles}underground.The main shafts of the mine are {NO.2 {Shaft and the ROCK HAULING SHAFT {which is 18,000 FT DEEP. }At the moment, {THE PERSONEL SHAFT }is 15,000 FT DEEP. {WHEAL JANE }has about 200-300 staff and about another 150 below ground using drilling rigs, rocker shovels ,pneumatic drills for drilling blast holes for the explosives to be set for blasting rock.
